item.title: 指南针语言|长期合作|英语进入中文
item.description: 在Proz.com上发布的工作 语言：英语至中文详细信息： 我希望你一切都好。 😊 我是Mariano，带有指南针语言的VM。 我们正在寻找专门从事教育领域的中国本地传统语言学家。 This can also lead to long-term and regular cooperation.Language Pair: English (US) > Chinese (Tra)Type of Work: - MTPE - Review / LSO - Terminology and consistency check onlyField: Education for early childhoodStart date: April 2025End date: February 2026If you are有兴趣的是，请分享您的简历，并以美元的价格分享[删除电子邮件]。我很乐意分享有关此项目和指南针语言的更多详细信息。

item.title: 加入我们的团队作为撰稿人 - 母语者想要
item.description: 在Proz.com上发布的工作 语言：多对详细信息： 关键职责： 发展，适应或修改内容，以与您的母语保持一致性和品牌的一致性和品牌的友好性，以确保多样化的受众与多样化的观众保持良好的态度。 trends in language, culture, and communication.Qualifications:Native proficiency in one of the following languages: Dutch, Romanian, Czech, Hungarian, Serbian, Croatian, Estonian, Finnish, Danish.Background in copywriting, translation, or content creation.Strong understanding of cultural nuances and linguistic variations.Excellent written and verbal沟通技巧。创造性思维和产生新鲜的原始想法的能力。对新技术和行业趋势的兴趣。灵活性和渴望学习和适应不断变化的要求。机构不允许参与。限于自由职业者。 Preferred Skills:Experience in creative fields such as marketing, advertising, digital media, UX, games, or prompting.Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.Strong attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality work.If you are a creative thinker with a passion for languages and a desire to explore new opportunities, we would love to hear from you.加入我们，成为一个重视创新和创造力的动态团队的一部分。 应用程序说明：请完成我们的[url删除]，并将您的简历发送到表格中提供的电子邮件地址。 收到您的信息后，我们将非常高兴地与您联系并与您共享更多详细信息。

item.title: 基于纽约语言学家进行的校对和公证 + Apostille
item.description: 在Proz.com上发布的工作 语言：英语至西班牙语详细信息：仅美国， 请检查下面的项目详细信息。 文档类型：出生证书单词：479 要遵循的步骤： 1）您需要翻译所有文本，并确保翻译所有文本。 Translation certificates (Spanish and English templates will be provided by us) to fill in and support the translated document.2) Once the proofreading is completed, you must share the e-copies for the client's approval.3) Once the proofread documents are approved, you need to take the document to New York County for Notarization and later get this apostilled from SOS.4) Thereafter, you need to send us the e-copies of notarization and apostille just to ensure all details are correctly incorporated as mentioned.5) Once everything is clear, you need to mail the documents to our client by using a FedEx mailing label (mailing label will be provided by us)Please let us know if you can assist with this task and your best rate for all the combined services.如果要求，可以共享文件，但是，需要先签署NDA。
